description: Acuaponicos is a family-run initiative based in Popay√°n, Colombia, dedicated to sustainable aquaponics and organoponics. The project aims to provide toxin-free fish and vegetables while promoting environmental awareness. Over nine years, they have developed innovative techniques to enhance productivity and quality of life, overcoming challenges such as high initial costs and lack of institutional support. Their goal is to establish aquaponics as a viable agricultural practice in the region.
name: Acuaponicos
